section.p: The eclipse plugins can be installed in many ways, all with the same result.

The plugins can be found on the eclipse market place. The URL for the market place is http://marketplace.eclipse.org/. Searching for docfacto will list the plugin. Once located, simply drag the install icon to your eclipse workbench.

The market place can also be launched from within Eclipse via
Help Eclipse Marketplace
The eclipse plugin can be installed from the Docfacto download site. The URL for this is http://www.docfacto.com/eclipse/4.2

To install use the Eclipse menus
Help Install New Software
This will enable you to enter the URL above, which will locate and install the Docfacto Eclipse Plugin. Once the Eclipse plugin has been install, you will need to locate the Docfacto.xml from the previous install. This is done by using the menus
Preferences... Docfacto
